name: swift-docstrings
description: Xcode-style proportional font rendering for Swift /// doc comments

swiftDocstrings.enabled.description: Enable Xcode-style proportional font rendering for /// doc comments.

swiftDocstrings.fontFamily.description: Font family for doc comment text. Use a proportional/sans-serif font for the Xcode look.

swiftDocstrings.fontSize.description: Optional font size override for doc comment text (e.g. "0.95em", "13px"). Leave empty to inherit the editor font size.

swiftDocstrings.codeColor.description: Color for inline code and doc tag keywords (e.g. Parameters, Returns). Accepts any CSS color value.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
